content:
Russian troops have been attacked by Mikhailovka in Berislav region from drones.

About thisinformsKherson Ova.

“A 59-year-old man was injured at lunch as a result of the drone explosion. He was diagnosed with contusion. The victim was provided first aid. In the future, it will be outpatient treatment, ”the message reads.

In addition, in the departmentreportedthat a man was injured through the Russian shelling of Kherson.

“The 80-year-old locally came under a hostile blow around 3:00 pm. He was injured in the chest. The victim was taken to the hospital where he is provided with medical care, ”the administration said.

We will remind, in Mikhailivka as a result of attack of shock droneDiedwoman.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy continuesAttach the civilian population of Kherson region: There are wounded.
title: The occupiers have been fired at Kherson region again, there are victims
description: The Kherson Ova informs about it. “At lunch as a result of a drone explosion ...
author: Army Inform
